summary: Request to enable GitHub Discussions feature for the PHP SDK repository to provide a dedicated space for questions and help requests separate from issue tracking.
userImpact: Users would have a dedicated space for asking questions and getting help without cluttering the issue tracker.
proposedFix: Enable the Discussions feature in repository settings
workaround: Use existing Question label, Slack channel, or Community Forum
keyQuote: It would allow me to ask questions or ask for help, things that are not issues perse.
